alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 10 at 11:52AM MST until November 10 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Blowing snow could reduce visibility to under one-quarter mile at times. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Rawlins. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Light weight and high profile vehicles including light load semis and those towing camper trailers will be at risk. Icy roads and reduced visibility will increase the travel hazard.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 MPH or gusts of 58 MPH or more can lead to property damage.
